channel.title: What's New at the Lunar and Planetary Institute Library
channel.description: Covers additions to the library collection, tips on using library services and resources, and provides news on what is happening in the library and RPIF at the Lunar and Planetary Institute
channel.itunes:summary: Covers additions to the library collection, tips on using library services and resources, and provides news on what is happening in the library and RPIF at the Lunar and Planetary Institute
channel.itunes:author: LPI
channel.itunes:keywords: LPI, USRA, RPIF, Library, Science, Astronomy, Geology

item.title: News from November 14, 2007
item.dc:creator: LPI
item.description: Topics included in this audio version of What's New at the LPI: Publications now online in full-text; Inventory; Apollo Metric photography available; Back to the Moon With LRO; and descriptions of selected titles recently added to the collection.
item.content:encoded: Topics included in this audio version of What's New at the LPI Library: Publications now online in full-text; Inventory; Apollo Metric photography available; Back to the Moon With LRO; and descriptions of selected titles recently added to the collection.
item.itunes:summary: Topics included in this audio version of What's New at the LPI Library: Publications now online in full-text; Inventory; Apollo Metric photography available; Back to the Moon With LRO; and descriptions of selected titles recently added to the collection
item.itunes:keywords: Full-text online, inventory, Apollo Metric Photography, Video, YouTube, Library, Podcasts, Books
item.itunes:author: LPI
